subject: Interscholastic Athletics
lead_paragraph: The Redmen of Smith Center, Kan., ran their record to 11-0 last night when they defeated the previously unbeaten Oakley Plainsmen, 56-0. Smith Center, which has outscored its opponents by 760-0 this season, is two victories from a fourth straight Class 2-1A state championship that would give it seven titles in the last 25 years.
